mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ABSENCE_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.SCHEDULE_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_TITLE , A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE , A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE , A.SCHEDULE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.SCHEDULE_WRITER , A.CALENDAR_SCHEDULE_TYPE_CODE , A.PROJECT_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_DELETE_STATUS , B.PROJECT_TITLE FROM TBL_CALENDAR_SCHEDULE A JOIN TBL_PROJECT B ON (A.PROJECT_CODE = B.PROJECT_CODE) JOIN TBL_PROJECT_MEMBERS C ON (A.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND A.PROJECT_CODE = C.PROJECT_CODE) WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND A.CALENDAR_SCHEDULE_TYPE_CODE = 1 AND A.SCHEDULE_DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT A.SCHEDULE_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_TITLE , A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE , A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE , A.SCHEDULE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.SCHEDULE_WRITER , A.CALENDAR_SCHEDULE_TYPE_CODE , A.PROJECT_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_DELETE_STATUS FROM TBL_CALENDAR_SCHEDULE A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND A.CALENDAR_SCHEDULE_TYPE_CODE != 1 AND A.SCHEDULE_DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT A.SCHEDULE_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_TITLE , A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE , A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE , A.SCHEDULE_BODY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.SCHEDULE_WRITER , A.CALENDAR_SCHEDULE_TYPE_CODE FROM TBL_CALENDAR_SCHEDULE A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND A.SCHEDULE_DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CALENDAR_SCHEDULE A ( A.SCHEDULE_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_TITLE , A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE , A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE , A.CALENDAR_SCHEDULE_TYPE_CODE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.SCHEDULE_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCHEDULE_CODE.NEXTVAL , #{ title } , (SELECT TO_DATE(#{ startDate } ,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM DUAL) , (SELECT TO_DATE(#{ endDate } ,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM DUAL) , 2 , #{ memberNo } , #{ memberName } )

INSERT INTO TBL_CALENDAR_SCHEDULE A ( A.SCHEDULE_CODE , A.SCHEDULE_TITLE , A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE , A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE , A.CALENDAR_SCHEDULE_TYPE_CODE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.SCHEDULE_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCHEDULE_CODE.NEXTVAL , #{ title } , (SELECT TO_DATE(#{ startDate } ,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM DUAL) , (SELECT TO_DATE(#{ endDate } ,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM DUAL) , 3 , #{ memberNo } , #{ memberName } )
mapper.delete: DELETE TBL_CALENDAR_SCHEDULE A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo }
